summary: A suicidal woman and a male prostitute connect in an ATM station and begin a tenuous affair.
cast: Cecilia Bengolea|Leonardo Brzezicki|Adrián Fondari|Pablo Razuk|Fabián Talín|Carlos Issa|Fernando Moumdjian|Juan Martín Gravina|Pablo Sirianni|Cristian Dos Santos|Violeta Uman|Ezequial López|Adrián Blanco
title: Vagón fumador
